subject: Horse Racing
Horses
Belmont Stakes
lead_paragraph: Sometimes called the Keeper of the Silks or the Colors Man, Louis Olah is in charge of the jockeys’ wardrobes at the Aqueduct, Belmont and Saratoga tracks.
snippet: Sometimes called the Keeper of the Silks or the Colors Man, Louis Olah is in charge of the jockeys’ wardrobes at the Aqueduct, Belmont and Saratoga tracks.
